sentences.sContent: He's a clever man,but fails in perseverance.
sentences.sContent_eng: He's a clever man,but fails in perseverance.
sentences.sCn: 他是一个聪明人，但缺乏毅力。

sentences.sContent: Their power does not come from rank or title but from intellect and perseverance.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their power does not come from rank or title but from intellect and perseverance.
sentences.sCn: 他们的权力并非来自等级或头衔，而是来自他们的智慧和毅力。

words.tran: 固执的，坚持的；持久稳固的
持续言语（指言语反复不止的病态）；持续重复的行为；执拗
坚持；不屈不挠；固执己见（在辩论中）
患持续言语症；表现固执
